page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ....
page.content:
Lunch is finished,We're here again. Splish, splash,it's started to rain We have English,Peak and, at last, we scribble down the homework fast We finish and Mr Hayhurst says "dismissed" Oh how I have an aching wrist.
We walk straight home at the end of the day Homework first, then out to play. My mum calls me in for tea. It's bolognese sauce,my favourite spagetti It's my Clarinet next,I try to blow Are the notes right? I don't know. Then,into bed,sleep tight, Another day, another night.
Anna Le Huquet aged 11
